word:
Chap. 23 - Seek God for Wisdom and Power; Feed on the Bread of Life

Manuscript 144, 1901

     [Sermon at an early morning meeting, April 3, 1901, in the Battle Creek Tabernacle.] 


     I thank the Lord that so many have come out to this early five-o'clock meeting to worship God. I desire that my heart shall be drawn out to God. It is our privilege to feel the deep movings of His Spirit.
